header.description: Plug-in to interact with the SAP Change and Transport System.

step-type.name: Add to Buffer
step-type.description: Add the transport number to the buffer to be imported.

property-ui.label: tp Path
property-ui.description: Path to the transport control program (tp) on the system. Default location is '/usr/sap/${p:resource/sap.sid}/SYS/exe/run/tp'.

property-ui.label: Transport Request Number
property-ui.description: Newline delimited list of transport request numbers to add to the buffer (ie. DEV12345). Also accepts a filename with a list of transport numbers.

property-ui.label: SAP System ID
property-ui.description: SID of the target SAP system.

property-ui.label: Client Number
property-ui.description: The number for the client on the target system. (ie. 100)

property-ui.label: Profile Name
property-ui.description: The path and name of the target profile. (ie. /usr/sap/trans/bin/TP_DOMAIN_DEV.PFL)

step-type.name: Import
step-type.description: Import the transports added to the buffer.

property-ui.label: tp Path
property-ui.description: Path to the transport control program (tp) on the system. Default location is '/usr/sap/${p:resource/sap.sid}/SYS/exe/run/tp'.

property-ui.label: Transport Request Number
property-ui.description: Newline delimited list of transport request numbers to add to the buffer (ie. DEV12345). Also accepts a filename with a list of transport numbers.

property-ui.label: SAP System ID
property-ui.description: SID of the target SAP system.

property-ui.label: Client Number
property-ui.description: The number for the client on the target system. (ie. 100)

property-ui.label: Profile Name
property-ui.description: The path and name of the target profile. (ie. /usr/sap/trans/bin/TP_DOMAIN_DEV.PFL)

step-type.name: Add File to Transport
step-type.description: Attaches a given file to an ABAP CTS transport request.

property-ui.label: CTS-Attach Location
property-ui.description: The path to the install directory for the cts-attach tool. See plug-in documentation for more information. (ex. /.

property-ui.label: SAP Url
property-ui.description: Host name and port for the SAP server. (ex. http://hostname.sap.com:5555

property-ui.label: Client Number
property-ui.description: The number for the client on the target system.

property-ui.label: SAP System ID
property-ui.description: System identifier of the upload system.

property-ui.label: File
property-ui.description: The full or relative path and name of the file to be added to the transport request. (ex. ./file.mtar)

property-ui.label: Application
property-ui.description: The application type of the file. (ex. HCP)
